name: Grapple Runner
description:
Grapple Runner is a puzzle-platformer game about using a grapple to make it from one side to the other. Each map is different, with new challenges, or puzzles! 

You're welcome to make a video, or stream this game (Please give credit to me if you do.)

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJZ8VKkDWJONyPq4ImZUktg

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/brickogames
